select sc.*, qb.*, sb.* from SysInspectionContent sc, QuoteBasis qb, SampleBasis sb where sc.quote_basis_id = qb.id and sc.sample_basic_id = sb.id and sc.inspection_content_name like '%${_parameter}%'

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
